name: denationalization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the action of changing an industry from being owned or controlled by the government of a country to being privately owned: A process of denationalization occurred in state railways and the postal service. The last years of the 20th century were marked by some wide-ranging denationalizations. See
denationalize
More examplesFewer examplesThe Minister's reply was a further argument against denationalization.A central government agency was set up for the denationalization of state enterprises.The government introduced measures on price deregulation, denationalization and privatization.

the process of denationalizing a government organization: A central government agency was set up to manage the denationalization of state enterprises. Compare
nationalize
privatization
